Today in County Clare, surf is looking solid with 8 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering good windows throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 13 ft @ 14s WSW swell and fresh 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, surf improves to 7 ft @ 12s W with light 7 mph SSE winds, creating fun options at sheltered spots like Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: today.
